message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $110. I think you'll find it's a great deal for the value it provides.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $95. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but $95 is too low for me.  Could you meet me halfway at $102.50?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with $100 for the product.
